about_the_game:
Introduction


H-CG can be opened after completing level 2-5

You are an assassin with extraordinary skills. live in seclusion in an inconspicuous mansion on Flower Street and work in the Nandemoya. Your life is actually pretty good by yourself, but the little sister next door comes to visit you all day long. You are a legendary assassin, you originally dismissed the girl's request, but...so big! This little sister's breasts are really big!

Gameplay


Although "Nandemoya of Flower Street" has a storyline of nearly 100,000 characters, it is essentially a strategy game. In terms of combat, it pays special attention to the arrangement and use of skills. Skills are divided into four types. You can get new sSkills and equipments by completing entrusts.Free to create your own fighting style.
For players who don't want to think and just want to play sex, the game has also prepared a "simple mode" very intimately. Just press the automatic battle to pass the level easily. However, it is recommended to play the game in normal mode to fully experience the combat system. Bring the fun.

Game Features

  • Dynamic CG
  • Rich storyline
  • Female characters with different personalities
  • Matching Skills
  • Exciting strategic battles
  • Some Japanese dubbing

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are over 18 years old.
This game contains nudity and sexual depictions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

short_description: Freely create your own fighting style, find the right target on the busy street and knock it down. As long as you complete the girl's commission, you can get the intimate reward you are eager for.
